Question: This person continues to be mourned throughout the world and has been the subject of numerous memorials and tributes.
Hints: This person and Ono moved to New York in August 1971, and in December released "Happy Xmas (War Is Over)".
The ____–McCartney songwriting partnership is regarded as one of the most influential and successful of the 20th century.
The following year, the BRIT Award for Outstanding Contribution to Music went to this person.
